perturbation.original_text: This Schedule (“Schedule”) is made as of the effective date set forth above to that Software License, Customization, and Maintenance Agreement, by and between Cardlytics, Inc. (“Supplier”) and Bank of America, N. A, (“Bank of America”), dated November 5, 2010, as amended (“SLCMA”). Each capitalized term used but not defined herein shall have the meaning assigned in the SLCMA.
perturbation.changed_text: This Schedule (“Schedule”) is made as of the effective date set forth above to that Software License, Customization, and Maintenance Agreement, by and between Cardlytics, Inc. (“Supplier”) and Bank of America, N. A, (“Bank of America”), dated November 5, 2010, as amended (“SLCMA”). Each capitalized term used but not defined herein shall have the meaning assigned in this Schedule, regardless of the SLCMA.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that capitalized terms are defined within the Schedule itself, overriding any definitions present in the SLCMA. This contradicts the original statement explicitly referencing the SLCMA for definitions, creating potential confusion and disputes over the meaning of key terms.

perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Bank of America and Supplier entered into the SLCMA in order to set forth the terms and conditions pursuant to which Supplier provides certain Software to Bank of America,
WHEREAS, the parties desire to add to the SLCMA the Supplier Offer Placement System Software;
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Bank of America and Supplier entered into the SLCMA in order to set forth the general framework. Specific operational terms for the software will be defined only in this schedule.
WHEREAS, the parties desire to define the Supplier Offer Placement System Software independently of the SLCMA;
perturbation.explanation: By stating that the operational terms are defined only in the schedule, it directly contradicts the earlier statement where the SLCMA defines the general framework. This means, there is no clarity to which has more power over the contract and also affects the terms of the old framework.

perturbation.original_text:
NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the promises and accords made herein, and the exchange of such good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, Bank of America and Supplier agree as follows:
The attached Schedule [A] is hereby incorporated into the SLCMA describing the Offer Placement System Software for use by Bank of America.
perturbation.changed_text:
NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the promises and accords made herein, and the exchange of such good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, Bank of America and Supplier agree as follows:
The attached Schedule [A] will be treated as a separate agreement and will only describe the Offer Placement System Software for use by Bank of America. All other terms in the SLCMA do not apply.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by first stating the Schedule is incorporated into the SLCMA, then stating the schedule will be treated as a separate agreement, invalidating any reliance on the SLCMA. It will be unclear what the original standing agreement is and creates ambiguity over how much should be enforced in different situations.
